com.wiseapps.davacon.core.se
Class SEAudioStreamEngine

java.lang.Object
  com.wiseapps.davacon.core.se.SEAudioStreamEngine
Direct Known Subclasses:
MockProjectEngine, SEProjectEngine
public abstract class SEAudioStreamEngine
extends Object

Objects of this class provide entry point for operations with objects of SEProject class.

Method Detail

startPlaying

public abstract void startPlaying()
Starts playing the object of SEProject class right from the current position.

pausePlaying

public abstract void pausePlaying()
Pauses playing the object of SEProject class. Current position remains unchanged.

stopPlaying

public abstract void stopPlaying()
Stops playing the object of SEProject class. Current position is reset to 0.

startRecording

public abstract void startRecording()
Starts recording the object of SEProject class right from the current position.

stopRecording

public abstract void stopRecording()
Stops playing the object of SEProject class. Current position remains unchanged.
